sources.title: Indiscretion of an American Wife
sources.description: Title: Indiscretion of an American Wife Summary: Prior to leaving by train for Paris, a married American woman tries to break off her affair with a young Italian in Rome's Stazione Termini. Directed by: Vittorio De Sica Actors: Jennifer Jones, Montgomery Clift, Gino Cervi Production Company: Columbia Pictures Corporation Release Date: 10 May 1954 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Color: Black and White A married American woman has gotten involved with another man while visiting relatives in Rome. She decides that the time has come to break off the relationship, and she makes plans to return home to her husband. But she soon realizes that she is not at all sure about what she wants to do, and she continues to agonize over her decision.
